item.description:
This Event is being organized by Kelley: http://www.meetup.com....

Harpoon was created in 1986, and has two brewery locations; one in Vermont and another right here in Boston. In an effort to distinguish itself from other beers, Harpoon has always relied on word of mouth and customer experiences (tours, tastings and events) to market itself rather than traditional advertising. As a result of this customer-oriented approach, Harpoon is now the third largest brewery in New England.

Harpoon brewery is accessible on the silver line: SL2 and SL3 stop directly in front of the brewery at the Harbor St stop. Please visit MBTA.com or the link below for more info on directions:

http://www.harpoonbre...

Harpoon offers brewery tours Saturdays and Sundays which last about an hour, cost $5 at the door (a portion of which goes towards Harpoon Helps), and end with sampling of Harpoon beers. Tours are popular, so please arrive no later than 1:30pm to get tickets for the 2pm tour. We will meet outside the brewery at 1:30pm.

http://www.harpoonbre...

After the tour, we will grab a bite to eat close by.

group.name: Brunch & More (20/30-Somethings for brunch & more, etc...)

item.name: Harpoon Brewery Tour
